techmeme.title: Elon Musk says he needs to be "super focused on X/xAI and Tesla", saying major operational improvements need to be made "as evidenced by the X uptime issues" (Valentine Baldassari/Bloomberg)

Sources: Nvidia plans to launch a new AI chip priced between $6,500 and $8,000, well below the $10,000-$12,000 the H20 sold for, after US export curbs (Reuters)
X experienced a significant outage globally on Saturday morning, after a fire reportedly broke out in an Oregon data center owned by X on Thursday (Wes Davis/The Verge)
The Shein India app, launched by Mukesh Ambani's Reliance Retail in partnership with Shein, has struggled to gain traction after launching in February (Rest of World)
